title: New Games From Respawn and Arkane? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.06.21
description:
Blessing and Gary Whitta talk about rumored games from Respawn Entertainment and Arkane, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:11:30 - Housekeeping
This week’s Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and we’re discussing “Best Of 2020”. Our official game of the year episode is on its way next week so be on the lookout for that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer:
Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:12:13 - Respawn is working on a new game??? - Isaac McIntyre @ Dexerto
00:19:19 - Speaking of mystery projects: A Dishonored Co-Creator Is Working on a New Arkane Game - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:22:50 - Could Xbox be considering adding Dualsense features? - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:34:50 - Outriders is delayed - Outriders Twitter
00:44:00 -  Ad
00:48:00 - Netflix for 3DS and Wii U is shutting down - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:52:18 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:53:15 - What are your thoughts on the concept of pre-ordering in 2021? - Jerrod B.
01:06:24 - Squad Up:ThatMarioRivera(crossplay for Fortnite) - Thatmariorivera
01:07:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless and Tim
